content.about: Everard Auctions & Appraisals provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Southern estate collections, fine/decorative arts (18th–20th century), silverware. With 22 experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Established in 2003 by Chris and Amanda Everard; Amanda has a background from Sotheby's.

reviews.author: John T.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Robert W.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable. The appraisal was detailed and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Jessica M.
reviews.content: Professional service with good attention to detail, but would have appreciated more explanation of the valuation methodology.

business.pricing: Custom quotes based on collection size

content.about: Redtail Appraisals (Rebekah Assid) provides professional art appraisal services specializing in fine art, decorative arts, antiques, luxury goods. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Rebekah holds a BA in Art History and has extensive experience working with auction houses.

reviews.author: Nancy W.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. The appraisal report was comprehensive and well-documented.

reviews.author: Jessica D.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any art appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Elizabeth J.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable. The appraisal was detailed and delivered on time.

content.about: AppraiseItNow provides professional art appraisal services specializing in fine art, antiques, estate appraisals. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Provides both online and limited in-person appraisal services.

reviews.author: Linda W.
reviews.content: Provided an incredibly thorough appraisal of my art collection. Their knowledge of the market is impressive.

reviews.content: AppraiseItNow's expertise in fine art made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

content.about: Anderson Fine Art Appraisals (AFAA) provides professional art appraisal services specializing in European art, American art, Contemporary, Modern, Impressionist, 19th-century works, Expert witness services, litigation support, authentication research. With Decades experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.

content.about: Escher Associates (EA) provides professional art appraisal services specializing in paintings, sculpture, photography, rare books. With Established in 1984 experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Handled art fraud cases in collaboration with LAPD.
